name: Summer Camp
description: Pomeroy offers the Summer Camp Program once the school year comes to an end. During two summer sessions, they offer fun and enriching recreational activities for children and teens. Activities include drama, dance, arts & crafts, sports, indoor and outdoor therapeutic recreation activities, swimming, computer lab, community outings, and cooking classes.
